thread.title: BRIEF-Getty Realty Corp Qtrly Net Earnings $0.33 Per Share

title: BRIEF-Getty Realty Corp Qtrly Net Earnings $0.33 Per Share
text: February 28, 2018 / 9:21 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Getty Realty Corp Qtrly Net Earnings $0.33 Per Share Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Getty Realty Corp: * QTRLY NET EARNINGS OF $0.33 PER SHARE * QTRLY ‍FUNDS FROM OPERATIONS (FFO) OF $0.51 PER SHARE​ * QTRLY AFFO OF $0.43 PER SHARE * ‍ESTABLISHED ITS 2018 AFFO GUIDANCE AT A RANGE OF $1.68 TO $1.74 PER DILUTED SHARE​ * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.44 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * INCREASED QUARTERLY DIVIDEND BY 14 PERCENT * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.83 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
